resources.string: Here you can find activities to practise your reading skills.
Reading will help you to improve your understanding of the language and vocabulary.
The self-study lessons in this section are written and organised languages (CEFR).
There are different types of texts and interactive exercises that practise the time.
Take our free online English test to find out which level to choose.
Select your level, from beginner, and improve your reading skills at your whenever
